product_overview: Nébula Studio is a Dark Premium single-page web presence designed to convert visitors into high-ticket clients by showcasing cinematic branding, AI and strategy authority. The site combines immersive visuals, animated interactions and a lead-generation contact flow to validate agency credibility.
core_goals: Convert visitors into high-ticket leads through a cinematic, trust-building experience
Showcase authority in Branding, AI and Strategy with a Dark Premium visual language
Provide a responsive, accessible single-page site that performs smoothly across devices
Capture leads with a validated, AJAX-style contact form and clear conversion feedback
Ensure social/SEO metadata and accessible navigation for share previews and screen readers

features.name: Landing Page UI
features.description: Main visual showcase with Dark Premium aesthetic (glassmorphism, neon, depth) and content sections like 'Sua jornada estelar' and client testimonials.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Scroll through sections -> View "Sua jornada estelar" (Journey) -> View Client Testimonials -> Observe glassmorphism and neon styling
Navigate to / -> Scroll through sections on low-performance device -> Observe FPS drop below 60fps -> See animations stutter and fallback static visuals displayed

features.name: WhatsApp Contact
features.description: Floating WhatsApp button for direct contact, opens chat link or app from the landing page.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Click WhatsApp floating button -> Open WhatsApp chat in a new tab or app -> See prefilled message or the contact number ready
Navigate to / -> Click WhatsApp floating button -> Device/browser cannot open WhatsApp app -> Show fallback prompt with phone number and option to copy

features.name: Contact Form (Lead Gen)
features.description: Contact form validating required fields (Nome, Contato) and replacing the form with a confirmation message after successful submission without page reload.
user_flows: Navigate to /#contato -> Fill Nome field -> Fill Contato field -> Click Submit button -> See confirmation message replace the form without page reload
Navigate to /#contato -> Leave Nome field empty -> Leave Contato field empty -> Click Submit button -> See inline validation errors on required fields

features.name: Navigation (Desktop & Mobile)
features.description: Fixed desktop menu with backdrop-blur, mobile overlay menu and mobile bottom navigation bar for smaller viewports; anchors perform smooth scrolling.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Observe fixed desktop menu with backdrop-blur -> Click a desktop menu anchor -> Smooth scroll to target section (#servicos or #contato) -> Observe focus state on the target
Navigate to / on mobile viewport -> Click mobile menu icon -> Mobile overlay menu opens -> Click a menu link -> Overlay closes -> Page scrolls to the chosen section
Navigate to / on small viewport -> Click mobile menu icon -> Menu overlay fails to open -> Menu remains unresponsive or inaccessible

features.name: Animations & Interactivity
features.description: Hero title glitch (alternating phrases), cursor glow that follows the mouse, scroll reveal class triggers, radial stats animating when in viewport, and magnetic buttons reacting to cursor proximity.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Observe hero title alternating phrases (glitch effect) -> Move mouse across hero -> Observe smooth cursor glow following the cursor -> Scroll down -> Elements enter viewport and gain 'reveal' classes -> Scroll to radial stats -> Radial charts animate from 0 to final values

Navigate to / on low-performance device -> Observe hero title alternating phrases -> Move mouse across hero -> Cursor glow stutters or lags -> Scroll to radial stats -> Radial charts fail to animate or animate partially -> See decreased frame rate

features.name: Accessibility & SEO
features.description: Metadata for optimized social previews, use of Material Symbols and semantic markup to support keyboard navigation and screen readers.
user_flows: Navigate to / -> Inspect page metadata and open graph tags present -> Share link preview shows configured title and description
Navigate to / -> Use Tab to navigate interactive elements -> Focus lands on interactive elements with visible focus states -> Screen reader announces landmark roles and descriptive labels
Navigate to / with missing metadata -> Share preview shows incomplete card -> Validate remediation is required for social preview
